oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Pocket Diary of Zebulon Nixon
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Diary of Private Zebulon Nixon of the 36th Ohio Volunteer Infantry for the year of 1864. Nixon served at Chattanooga and gives daily account of where the regiment is. He refers to activities in Chattanooga, goes on leave for three weeks and returns to Ohio, then returns and gets involved in Virginia campaign.
